DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate efficacy safety low dose transdermal contraceptive delivery system contain ethinyl estradiol levonorgestrel .
DOC.brief_title: Transdermal Contraceptive Delivery System ( TCDS ) , Also Known AG200-15 Patch Arm
DOC.detailed_description: Comparative evaluation AG200-15 versus OC regard safety , contraceptive efficacy , hormone related adverse event , lipid profile , cycle control ( bleed pattern ) , subject compliance serum concentration EE LNG . To evaluate TCDS wearability ( include adhesion ) .
DOC.criteria: sexually active woman request contraception Regular menses every 24 35 day In good general health , confirm medical history , physical ( include gynecologic examination adn screen laboratory value Known suspect pregnancy Lactating woman Significant skin reaction transdermal preparation sensitivity surgical / medical tape Any disease may worsen hormonal treatment ( cardiovascular , liver , metabolic ) Use contraceptive method study medication
